name: Conquering Magic
description:
“Through the teachings of ‘Wizardy 101’ I, hooded character, will conquer the entire world! EhgheeHEE!”

Follow this mage on his endeavors to conquer the world, step at a time. Find mages to battle and win against them. Get stronger as a mage and live the dream of world domination in the magic world! However, what fate meets the mage when he’s not able to win the battles? The gameplay is a turn-based fighting game. With Visual Novel-like endings from the win-loss ratio. There are multiple endings in the game.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 41 by a team of five.

Edit: 

The game is now available for MacOS and WebGL! After hearing some confusions about the instructions of the battle system, they were explained in the dialogue. You may have missed it if you were going through the dialogue very fast. For the most part, however, you have three moves per round. You can drag the icons from the categories on the left to the slots in the grid on the right to set up your turn before hitting the play round button.
